IP_SYN_2_var_9:
Procedure: EBUS airway exam.
Target: RML mass.
Technique: Visualized shiny vascular growth in RML. Aspirated with needle. Hemorrhage managed with TXA. Sonographic staging of nodes 4L, 7, 4R, 11R performed (benign). Tissue harvested via forceps from RML. Moderate bleeding necessitated tamponade.
